name: 1c-syntax
description: Syntax definition rules for 1C:Enterprise 8 for tmLanguage-based text editors

scripts.build-grammars: yaml2json --pretty 1c.YAML-tmLanguage > 1c.json && yaml2json --pretty 1c-query.YAML-tmLanguage > 1c-query.json && json2cson 1c.json > grammars/1c.cson --2spaces && json2cson 1c-query.json > grammars/1c-query.cson --2spaces

author: xDrivenDevelopment
